com.strongloop.android.loopback

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strongloop.android.remoting.VirtualObject
      • com.strongloop.android.loopback.Model
        • com.strongloop.android.loopback.User

  • public class User
extends Model
    A local representative of a single user instance on the server. Derived from Model, the data is immediately accessible locally, but can be saved, destroyed, etc. from the server easily.
